data.text: @CityNewsKIT Well I'm on day 7 of testing positive for COVID-19 with symptoms and on meds. I have barely left the house in 2 years to keep a family member from dying, wear an N95 when I do go out,  3x vaxed and yet still got it exactly 2 years after first getting it. My lungs need to repair.

@CityNewsKIT Stop the number game! Everyone dying is over 70 and everyone getting Covid now is over it in 2-3 days. Schools donâ€™t seem to mind sending my kids back to class with 3 reported cases with his peers, kinda seems like the good old days when kids had the flu! Get over it and move on!

MORE: Ontario is reporting 1,959 new COVID-19 cases today, and 27 virus-related deaths.

Three of the deaths happened more than a month ago, and are being added as part of data clean up.
